pageContext.claim: “Innocent people have been savagely beaten, like the young man in Dallas, Texas, who was left dying on the street, or the woman in upstate New York viciously attacked by dangerous thugs.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's comments appear to refer to graphic videos of a man being beaten in Dallas that circulated widely on social media. One video posted to Twitter by a reporter for Blaze TV was viewed more than 33 million times. Dallas police said that man was alive Sunday and in stable condition at a hospital, according to the Ft. Worth Star-Telegram. Witnesses told investigators the attack began when the man “came to the protest wielding a large knife/machete at several protesters,” according to police Sgt. Warren Mitchell. He had the machete to “allegedly protect his neighborhood from protesters,” Mitchell said.
